long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On April 27, 1997, gamers were first instructed by the sage Peppy O'Hare to "Do a barrel roll!" in the game Star Fox 64. Now, relive the excitement for you and your friends, with a small click-event sound button conveniently placed in your extensions bar.
